item.description:
This is a repeat of one of our best events ever.

Soul City is a fabulous R&B/funk band that gets the entire room rocking from Song #1.

They have great singers and a horn section that will make you swoon. Folks who know this band tend to get incoherent on the subject. They choose great songs from some of the greatest artists -- Stevie, MJ, Aretha, Sam and Dave, Earth Wind and Fire and more.

Their motto is: You will dance. Resistance is futile. I have found this to be true.

The cost is $10 at the door. This band often sells out at this fun venue, so you might want to pay a little more online to be sure to get in. Tickets go on sale on the Tuesday before the show. The music starts around 9:30; get there earlier to meet and mingle with some other dancin' fools!

Parking is complementary in the S&S Parking lots both located on Hampshire Street.

http://www.rylesjazz.com/directions.cfm

Â
item.name: Soul City - Great dance band at Ryles!
